power.title: Astral Speech
power.fluff: You speak with such compelling conviction that others find it difficult to refure your beliefs and claims

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to Diplomacy checks until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Bless Weapon
power.fluff: You recite an ancient prayer to imbue your weapon with the power of pure faith

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one weapon you are wielding. You gain the following benefits with the chosen weapon until the end of the encounter:
+1 power bonus to attack rolls with the weapon.
You deal +1d6 additional radiant damage on a hit.
Against a creature vulnerable to radiant damage, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18 to 20.

power.title: Call of Challenge
power.fluff: You brandish your weapon and demand that all foes nearby face you in battle

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is subject to your Divince Sanction until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Kord's Strength
power.fluff: Kord answers your shouted prayer with strength and power, causing you to excel in acts of physical might

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must worship Kord.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would make an Athletics checks or an Endurance check

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +5 power bonus to the triggering check.
You also gain the following benefits until the end of your next turn:
+2 power bonus to melee damage rolls.
When you hit with a melee attack, the target is subject to your Divine Sanction until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Martyr's Blessing
power.fluff: You step into an attack made against an adjacent ally to save your comrade

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally adjacent to you is hit by a melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack is resolved against you instead of the triggering ally.

power.title: Restore Vitality
power.fluff: You lay your hands upon an ally, invoking divine power to restore a comrade to health and remove hindering effects

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, and can make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end.

power.title: Reward of Vice
power.fluff: Vice buoys your heart, and you revel in the power it provides

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must worship an evil or chaotic evil deity.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain 5 temporary hit points and can make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 10 temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 15 temporary hit points.
You also gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Reward of Virtue
power.fluff: You gird yourself in your high ideals and face the enemy with renewed determination

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must worship a good or lawful good deity.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You expend a healing surge to gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value + your level.

power.title: Sacred Circle
power.fluff: You trace a circle around you with your hand, and it quickly expands into a wide circle of faintly glowing runes that glows brightly and protects you and your close allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of protective runes until the end of the encounter.
You and your allies gain a +1 power bonus to AC while within the zone.

power.title: Touch of Grace
power.fluff: You take onto yourself the suffering of your ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You transfer one effect that a save can end from the target to yourself.
